text: Petros Triantafyllidis (born 1947) is a Greek wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle 52 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. His son also competed at the Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Greece Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:People from Siegen- Wittgenstein
title: Petros Triantafyllidis
